links.title: WhatsApp gets approval to launch payments feature in India
links.description: CHENNAI (Reuters) - WhatsApp has received approval to roll out its payments service in India starting with 20 million users, the country's flagship payments processor said on Thursday, giving the Facebook-owned app an entry into a crowded digital payments space.

messages.body:
Deutsche Bank returns to profit in third quarter

https://pageone.ng/2020/10/28/deutsche-bank-returns-to-profit-in-third-quarter/

$DB $HSBC

links.title: Deutsche Bank returns to profit in third quarter | PageOne
links.description: (Bloomberg) - Deutsche Bank (DB) on Wednesday reported a €182m (£164m, $214m) net profit in the third quarter, the first quarterly profit since Q1 2019, amid a strong performance in its investment bank arm and ongoing restructuring. In the same quarter in 2019, Deutsche posted a net loss of €832m.

links.title: This is why HSBC is surging today | PageOne
links.description: (Bloomberg) - HSBC Holdings Plc beat profit estimates for the third quarter, delivering an upside surprise as it pared back expected credit losses and signaled it may resume limited dividend payments already for this year.

links.title: NIO Is on Fire. But a New Analyst Throws Cold Water on the Stock.
links.description: analyst Yuqian Ding launched coverage of the company with a Hold rating and $30 price target, just below where shares were trading Friday. Ding is based in China. So details of the report aren't readily available. HSBC hasn't yet responded to a request for the report.
